statements: SELECT * FROM protein_interaction_network ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id_1, protein_id_2 FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE interaction_type = 'physical';
SELECT * FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE protein_id_1 = 4 OR protein_id_2 = 7;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE interaction_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT protein_id_1, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction_network ORDER BY protein_id_1 ASC, interaction_type DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, protein_id_1, protein_id_2, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE protein_id_1 = 1 AND protein_id_2 = 2;
SELECT * FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE interaction_type = 'Binding' ORDER BY protein_id_1 DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, protein_id_1, protein_id_2 FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE protein_id_1 = 2 OR protein_id_2 = 3 ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction_network WHERE protein_id_1 IN (1, 2, 3) AND protein_id_2 IN (4, 5) ORDER BY protein_id_1, protein_id_2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction_network GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Proteins ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, protein_function FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = 5;
SELECT protein_name, protein_function FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id > 10 AND protein_function LIKE '%kinase%';
SELECT protein_name FROM Proteins WHERE protein_function IS NOT NULL ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT protein_id, interaction_type, interaction_score FROM ProteinInteractionNetworks WHERE interaction_score > 0.5 ORDER BY interaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinInteractionNetworks WHERE interaction_type = 'binding' ORDER BY interaction_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT protein_name FROM Proteins ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id_1, protein_id_2, interaction_type FROM ProteinInteractionNetworks WHERE protein_id_2 = 5;
SELECT protein_id_1, protein_id_2, interaction_score FROM ProteinInteractionNetworks WHERE interaction_score > 0.8 ORDER BY interaction_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ProteinInteractionNetworks INNER JOIN Proteins ON ProteinInteractionNetworks.protein_id_1 = Proteins.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM Protein
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, protein_type FROM Protein
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Protein
SELECT * FROM Interaction
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM Interaction
SELECT * FROM Protein WHERE protein_type = 'enzyme';
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM Protein ORDER BY protein_id DESC;

SELECT protein_id, protein_name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM Protein LEFT JOIN Interaction ON Protein.protein_id = Interaction.protein_id1 GROUP BY protein_id HAVING num_interactions > 5;

SELECT Protein.protein_name, Interaction.interaction_strength, Pathway.pathway_name FROM Protein INNER JOIN Interaction ON Protein.protein_id = Interaction.protein_id1 LEFT JOIN Pathway ON Interaction.protein_id2 = Pathway.pathway_id;

SELECT DISTINCT Protein.protein_type, Pathway.pathway_name FROM Protein, Interaction, Pathway WHERE Protein.protein_id = Interaction.protein_id1 AND Interaction.interaction_id > 100 AND Pathway.pathway_id < 50 ORDER BY Protein.protein_type ASC, Pathway.pathway_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Protein
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Protein
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Physical'
SELECT pathway_name, pathway_description FROM Pathway
SELECT * FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 1
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Protein ORDER BY protein_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Binding' OR interaction_type = 'Inhibition'
SELECT p.protein_name, p.protein_sequence, i.interaction_type FROM Protein p JOIN Interaction i ON p.protein_id = i.protein1_id
SELECT pa.pathway_name, COUNT(pp.protein_id) AS protein_count FROM Pathway pa JOIN Pathway_Protein pp ON pa.pathway_id = pp.pathway_id GROUP BY pa.pathway_name HAVING protein_count > 2
SELECT * FROM protein_networks;
SELECT network_name, species FROM protein_networks ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 50;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='physical';
SELECT pathway_name FROM pathways WHERE pathway_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pathway_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM protein_networks;
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM protein_networks WHERE species = 'Human';
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM proteins ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT pathway_name, pathway_description FROM pathways WHERE LENGTH(pathway_description) > 50;
SELECT protein_1_id, protein_2_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'physical';
